game.name: Journey to the Heart of Gaia
game.shortDescription: 어느 저녁, 낯선 사람이 리즈의 집에 찾아와 그녀를 지구 중심 깊은 곳에 있는 오색찬란한 세상으로 데려가 버렸습니다. 강력한 폭군이 다스리고 있는 것으로도 모자라, 지하 세계의 핵은 죽어 가고 있군요! 리즈는 지하 세계를 구하고 다시 집으로 돌아갈 수 있을까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: One evening a stranger appears at Liz's doorway, whisking her away to a colourful world that lies deep within the centre of the Earth. Not only is it controlled by a powerful tyrant, but the very heart of Underworld is dying! Can Liz save this world and find the way back to her own?

reviewHighlights.text: Very beautiful and fun adventure! It has been a long time since I have played a hand-drawn point and click adventure that was this enjoyable. Lately,...
Great game! Puzzles run the gamut. Half the time spent is figuring them out. In MOST cases the hard puzzles did not differ much from the easier ones....
